person.name: Allan F. Packer
person.description: Elder Allan F. Packer was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 59. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Young Men general board. He has served as an Assistant Executive Director of the Family History Department and is currently serving as Executive Director of that department.
